mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.BRAND as brand, a.VIN as vin, a.YEAR as year, a.MODEL as model, a.ENGINE_NUM as engineNum, a.VEHICLE_RECEIPT_AMOUNT as vehicleReceiptAmount, a.SALES_STATUS as salesStatus, a.CHECK_STATUS as checkStatus, b.MILEAGE as mileage, c.FIRST_PARTY as firstParty, c.SECOND_PARTY as secondParty
mapper.select:
select
from uctp_car_info a inner join uctp_car_info_details b on a.id = b.CAR_ID inner join uctp_contract_management c on b.CAR_ID = c.CAR_ID
a.BUSINESS_ID = #{pageVO.businessId}
and (a.VIN like #{pageVO.searchValue} or a.BRAND like #{pageVO.searchValue})
order by a.CREATE_TIME desc
